entry.content:

NO FEE***PETS WELCOME***GUARANTORS OK***OWNER MANAGED**NO FEE*** BRAND NEW RENOVATED NO FEE JUNIOR ONE BEDROOM!!! ALL STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES!!! DISHWASHER!!! LAUNDRY IN BUILDING!!!

In West Chelsea on 9th avenue, the building is fully renovated and this is a brand new on the market. All new finishes, updated kitchen with high end appliances, new bathroom. Owner managed and pet friendly, steps from the High Line! Email us now for a tour!

U.S. Guarantors Accepted. Owner Managed! Pet Friendly!

Price and availability are subject to change.
Equal Housing Opportunity
